about_the_game:
Unleashed from the depths of mythology, ancient malevolent deities have awoken after millennia of slumber, resurrecting their supernatural armies to sow terror and assert dominion over humanity once more. As the rightful heir to the enigmatic forge of the legendary Hephaestus, your sacred duty lies in crafting the weapons imperative for your army's stand against this encroaching darkness. Embark on a worldwide odyssey, skillfully matching materials and executing precision work to fulfill your mission – whether in solitary pursuit or cooperative engagement – all the while safeguarding your forge from assailants and battling against the relentless passage of time. Ultimately, it shall fall upon your shoulders to wield the formidable secret blade, confronting the most formidable embodiments of evil in a climactic, epochal clash. The fate of the world rests within your grasp. Secret Blade is an unceasing thrill ride from inception to culmination!

Unveil Your Companion!


While navigating this enthralling adventure independently is undoubtedly gratifying, embarking on this journey with a faithful comrade amplifies the joy manifold. Enlist an ally by your side and together, traverse the entire campaign in seamless co-op. Divide responsibilities, wage joint combat, unearth concealed mysteries, and immerse yourselves in the unbridled chaos that ensues.

Unearth Mythic Armaments!


Harness the forge's power to meld a diverse array of materials; whether through serendipity or sagacity, amalgamate the appropriate constituents to furnish the allied forces with superlative weaponry, thereby bolstering the city's defenses.

Embrace Hephaestian Legacy!


In Secret Blade, the creation of a weapon of peerless quality is non-negotiable. From forging the weapon upon the anvil, to intricately fashioning the handle, and honing the blade to razor-sharp precision, these meticulous steps ensure that your soldiers wage valorous combat against the spectral hordes.

Beyond Smith, A Warrior Within!


Mistaken not: your role transcends mere blacksmithing, for within your sanctum, nefarious adversaries may materialize. Be ever-prepared, maintaining a ready weapon at your disposal to stave off these audacious intruders.

Forge Beyond Bounds!


Dismiss any preconceptions that foreign forges will mirror the familiarity of your Greek sanctuary. Vigilantly adapt to the strangest and most formidable locales, from the lofty altitudes of Machu Picchu's mountains to the searing expanse of the Egyptian desert – brace for unforeseen predicaments!

Converse with the Seafarer Captain!


Guided by the hand of the enigmatic captain, navigate towards historic towns wherein Gods and Demons, heretofore relegated to the realm of legends, materialize into existence. Yet, ponder: how is this mariner privy to such arcane knowledge? Might he harbor concealed truths of his own...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take command of the mystical forge of Hephaestus and craft the most legendary weapons in the war against evil. Travel the world facing challenges in singleplayer or co-op. Combine materials and master crafting steps while protecting your forge from enemies and fighting against time!
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
